raw_comment:
Notice: The large margin between China and India.  
Wonder: Over what time period was ths data collected? How has it changed in 10, 20, 50 years? 
My Community: This story make me more aware of my singular electricity usage and the impact it could have on a smaller scale. 
Headline: "United States win war aginst energy usage."
ace_sentences: There is a large margin between China and India.
I wonder over what time period the data was collected.
I wonder how the data has changed in 10 years.
I wonder how the data has changed in 20 years.
I wonder how the data has changed in 50 years.
This story makes me more aware of my electricity usage.
My electricity usage could have an impact on a smaller scale.
The headline is: "United States win war against energy usage."
